newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Asia Gas Oil/Jet - Gas oil steady in quiet trade.
newsitem.headline: Asia Gas Oil/Jet - Gas oil steady in quiet trade.

text.p: Singapore gas oil was steady on Monday in quiet trading with no deals concluded as the market was firmly range bound in the absence of fresh indicators, traders said.
"No one is willing to push the market one way or the other," one trader said.

Sellers offered late May lifting cargoes down to a low of $25.25 per barrel free-on-board, well above the $25.00 support level, while a bid was heard at $25.30 again about 20 cents below sellers target price for early June lifting cargoes.
There were no buyers for late May lifting cargoes.
Market attention was diverted by the unexpectedly large Indian Oil Corp (IOC) one-year term diesel award at low premiums.
IOC bought a total of 3.74 million tonnes for 1997-1998 delivery compared with the 1.3 million tonnes it bought for 1996-97.

The award price was well below previaling spot prices with two 45,000-tonne cargoes awarded at 30 cents above spot Middle East quotes to Kuwait Petroleum Corp (KPC) on a free-on-board basis, compared to current premiums of about 60 cents.
It also awarded to KPC one 45,000 tonne cargo of 0.25 percent sulphur at $2.14 above MidEast quotes on a cost-and-freight basis to the west coast.

IOC bought one 45,000 tonne cargo each from Glencore and BB Energy at $2.04 above MidEast quotes c-and-f east coast India, and one 87,000 tonne cargo from Marubeni at 91 cents above MidEast quotes c-and-f west coast.
In its previous term tender, IOC bought three 45,000 tonne 0.5 percent cargoes at between $2.49-2.59 c-and-f basis to the east coast.
Jet fuel was also range bound with both buyers and sellers holding their prices at around the $25.00 per barrel mark.
India awarded one 30,000 tonne kerosene cargo for arrival to the west coast at $1.32 per barrel over spot MidEast quotes on a c-and-f basis, almost unchanged from last year.
(Prices in dollars per barrel)
MTH FOB SIN BUY/SELL PREV BUY/SELL
JUN JET KEROSENE/KERO 24.80/25.10 24.90/25.10
JUN JET/GAS OIL SWAPS 0.10/0.30 -0.10/0.30
-- Singapore Newsroom (+65-870 3093)
